thread.title: Portland police investigate fatal shooting downtown
thread.title_full: Portland police investigate fatal shooting downtown | OregonLive.com

author: Noelle Crombie | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland police investigate fatal shooting downtown
text:
Portland police are investigating a fatal shooting near Southwest 3rd Avenue and West Burnside Street.
Police responded to the report of a shooting about 11:15 p.m. Sunday. They found a victim in a parking lot behind Dante's, a club located at 380 West Burnside Street.
About 45 minutes later, officers responded to a report of a second shooting near Northeast Martin Luther King Boulevard and Holladay Street. Police do not know if the two incidents are connected.
Police said the victim appeared to be in his late 30s. Witnesses said after the shooting, people ran from the area or got into cars and drove away.
No other information was immediately available about the incident.
Anyone with information about this incident is asked to call the Police Non-Emergency Line at 503-823-3333.
-- The Oregonian
